page.title: 15MY HOUSE CLANDORE
page.content: I am James Heather and I live in a late Medieval house.My Mum and Dad are trying to repair it to its former glory.My Dad is an antique dealer and expert.My house used to be an inn.It was named after Queen Elizabeth's visit to Woolpit as the Crown Inn. Later on it was a cafe called Clandore Cafe.At the bottom of our garden is the church and conker trees.Last year I got more than 300. I think my house would be ideal as a history project of Woolpit asit is the second biggest house in the area.The biggest house is the Swan.
